title: FT/FS: 3 PSA Graded HOFers: J Collins, Clarke, Davis  SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: 3 PSA Graded HOFers: J Collins, Clarke, Davis  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Continuing to clear out dupes.  Up for sale or trade are 3 PSA graded HOFers.

$SOLD Fred Clarke - PSA1 - Pinhole at top, otherwise a great looking card
$SOLD Jimmy Collins - PSA A - 
$SOLD George Davis - PSA 1(mk) - 

Buyer pays 2$ shipping for individual cards.  Will sell whole lot for $SOLD and free shipping.

Trades needed are: 
Home Run Baker, Chief Bender No Trees, Roger Bresnahan PORTRAIT, Mordecai Brown CUBSSHIRT, Eddie Collins, Sam Crawford THROWING, Johnny Evers PORTRAIT, Miller Huggins PORTRAIT, Hughie Jennings BOTHHANDSSHOWING, Willie Keeler PORTRAIT, Nap Lajoie PORTRAIT, John Mcgraw FINGERINAIR, John Mcgraw PORTRAITNOCAP, Joe Tinker BATOFFSHOULDER, Joe Tinker HANDSONKNEES, Joe Tinker BATONSHOULDER, Rube Waddell THROWING, Zack Wheat
Final price drop then they go back in the drawer. Let's get these sold!
